HISTORY
=======

0.2.1
-----
 - use last ZTFY.skin classes and remove dependency with ZTFY.blog package

0.2.0
-----
 - added new contextual "appskin:resources" TALES expression to get resources from
   new IApplicationResources interface adapter

0.1.3
-----
 - updated french translations

0.1.2
-----
 - added warning message for IE 8 or lower incompatibility

0.1.1
-----
 - CSS updates

0.1.0
-----
 - first release
